ELEMENT.DEFAULT: To get updates about our store, please subscribe to our mailing list below.

ELEMENT.HTML:
%PAGE_SUBSCRIBE_WELCOME%
<% /* collects all the variables passed (such as list id) and turns them into hidden form elements */ print(""); /* email and full name are set as text inputs so they're ignored here */ load("email,fullname"); set($blacklist_urivars=>$_); urivars(blacklist=>$blacklist_urivars); set($urivars=>$_); /* stackificate all the uri variables so they can be looped through */ load($urivars); pull(stack=>>$CGISTACK,format=>"textlist",delimiter=>"=",p0=>"KEY",p1=>"VALUE",linedelimiter=>"&"); :LOOP(); pop(stack=>>$CGISTACK,namespace=>"CGIVAR"); print(" "); goto(label=>"LOOP",nb=>$CGISTACK); %> <% /* support for multiple lists */ print(""); loadurp("profile:zoovy:wrap_subscribe_checkboxes"); default(""); stop(unless=>$_); format(pretext=>""); print(); %>
Email Address: " class='zform_textbox'>
Full Name: " class='zform_textbox'>
",posttext=>"

Thank you for subscribing to our mailing list

<% element(TYPE=>"SITEBUTTON",ID=>"SUBBUTTON",BUTTON=>"continue_shopping"); default(""); print(); %>

<% print(""); /* detect if CGI email variable is passed (even if blank) before running validation code */ loadurp("VAR::email"); tfu(true=>"1",false=>"1",undef=>"0"); stop(unless=>$_); /* run subscribe+validation code */ element(TYPE=>"EXEC",ID=>"XSUB",FUNCTION=>"RUN_SUBSCRIBE"); loadurp("VAR::xsub_err"); stop(unless=>$_); format(pretext=>"
",posttext=>"
"); print($_); %> <% /* now determine which body we show */ loadurp("VAR::email"); loadurp("VAR::xsub_err"); goto(nb=>$_,label=>"SUBSCRIBE"); /* xsub_err is set - back to subscribe you go! */ loadurp("VAR::email"); goto(eq=>"",label=>"SUBSCRIBE"); /* email was NOT set - back to subscribe you go! */ goto(label=>"SUCCESS"); /* xsub_err is blank, email is set, hurrah! */ :SUCCESS(); print("%SUCCESS_BODY%"); stop(); :SUBSCRIBE(); print("%SUBSCRIBE_BODY%"); stop(); %>
